body:
[Old TV]: That was once a brand new TV model from a great company. Now it's just a piece of junk covered in dust. 

[1]: [Try to turn the TV on] 
[2]: [Check cables (Forbearance | DC 12)] 
[3]: [Let the Old TV rest]
title: Start1

body:
[Old TV] You try to turn the TV on, but it doesn't respond. You're not sure if it's broken or if it's just not plugged in. 

[1]: [Check cables (Forbearance | DC 12)] 
[2]: [Let the Old TV rest]
title: TVOn

body:
[Forbearance]: You check the cables and find out that they already plugged in. You're not sure what's wrong with the TV, but you're pretty sure you cannot fix such complex thing. 

[1]: [Let the Old TV rest]
title: TVCablesPass

body:
[Forbearance]: You check the cables just to have your nostrils filled with dust. You were unable to identify a single thing; the only thing you got was to sneeze. (-1 Health) 

[1]: [Let the Old TV rest]
title: TVCablesFail

body:
[Old TV]: That was once a brand new TV model from a great company. Now it's just a piece of junk covered in dust. 

[1]: [Try to turn the TV on] 
[2]: [Let the Old TV rest]
title: Start2

body:

title: TVOn2
